title: Isn't Ao Shin coming out this year?
body: When they teased Ao Shin way back when did they say it was coming out did they say he was coming out in 2015 or 2016?

replies.body: They said he wouldn't be seen BEFORE 2015, but that is in no way an indication that he will be RELEASED in 2015. They said he had a lot of design problems so was pushed back from when he was first talked about.  It could be a few years before they finish working his issues out.

Ah, thanks. I wasn't sure exactly what they said about it...

(Still I really hope its this year o.o)

> [{quoted}](name=Sirsir94,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=iPjBEJuT,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-29T22:10:12.455+0000)
>
> Ah, thanks. I wasn't sure exactly what they said about it...
> 
> (Still I really hope its this year o.o)

Same :)

He will come out this year, but when he doesn't he will be said to come out in 2016, and then again in 2017, he will be a legendary champion who never gets made. until league of legends becomes obsolete and they try to reel people back in with him.

Look forward to the Lunar Reveal Event on February 19, because you never know what might happen, but I doubt that Ao Shin will be released early in the year. My guess is around April or June, but itâ€™s impossible to tell.

Yeah, he could take quite some time to release (looking back at champion concepts like Priscilla and Seth who became Elise and Azir, respectfully),  but be assured he will be the best Riot thinks he can be when he does :D
